page.title: 07A DAY IN MY LIFE.
page.content: I am Caroline, age 9.My mother is a school teacher and my father is a navigator in the R.A.F.I have a sister called Justine and a brother called Michael.On Saturday morning ,I get up at half past seven get dressed and get ready to go to the stables.Then I wake up my mum and I go down stairs.I draw the curtains and get my breakfast. I keep my puppy shut in the kitchen to stop him chewing. Then I go to the stables I groom some ponies and tack them up for people to ride.Then I muck out some stables.Then I have my lunch with my friend Zoe. After lunch we go down the field and set up a jumping course.We feed the horses . I normally feed my favourite pony Strawberry.At four my mum collects me.When I get home I have a bath and get in my night things, watch Dynasty on the T.V.and go to bed.
